snippet: Sierra Pacific Industries, a logging company, settled with the United States $122.5 million in damages over a 2007 wildfire that was among the most devastating in California history.
abstract: Logging company Sierra Pacific Industries agrees to pay the federal government $122.5 million in damages over a 2007 wildfire that was among the most devastating in California history.
lead_paragraph: Sierra Pacific Industries, a logging company, settled with the United States $122.5 million in damages over a 2007 wildfire that was among the most devastating in California history.

headline.main: California: Logger Will Pay Penalty for Fire
headline.print_headline: California: Logger Will Pay Penalty For Fire
